listing.listing_description:
This superb villa is part of the Headland, an exclusive beachfront community at Baan Taling Ngam on the southwest coast of Koh Samui. Set beside the Intercontinental Hotel, it offers exquisite privacy, a pristine beach, and breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand and the Five Islands. Your two-bedroom vacation rental offers exquisite serenity within this world-class setting, with ample outdoor living areas, luminous interiors, outstanding staff, and easy beach access. Ideal for small families or couples on honeymoon, the villa can also be rented in conjunction with other villas within The Headland—a superb choice for large family reunions or destination wedding guests.

The home is perfectly designed for enjoying the sublime ocean views and delicious breeze. A broad infinity pool stretches the width of the property, with lounge chairs beckoning you to bask in the sunlight and gaze upon the dreamy horizon. A vine-clad veranda extends from the main living room, with a lovely table for meals in the ocean breeze.

Broad walls open on three sides of the villa's great room, filling the space with an enchanting alfresco ambiance. Vaulted ceilings house the ample salon and dining table, with a gourmet kitchen presiding over the scene. The mezzanine loft is perched above the great room, and features a comfy sofa bed, television, bathroom, and doors opening to the garden—a lovely nook for quiet afternoons or dreamy nights.

The bedrooms feature high ceilings and folding glass doors opening to sweeping vistas. The master suite includes a king bed, while the guestroom has a pair of twin beds. Both rooms are air-conditioned and enjoy ensuite bathrooms.

From the beach beneath your villa, you can swim in the luminous sea, enjoy various watersports, or merely admire the spectacular sunset. The neighboring Intercontinental Hotel features wonderful wellness facilities and superb oceanfront dining. The villa is also within walking distance of a Muay Thai center and several superb restaurants in nearby villages, while Muang Waterfalls and Topcats Freshwater Fishing are easily reachable by car. Venture to nearby Nathon for the ferry to Angthong Marine National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
If you seek an incredible Thai vacation, look no further than Samujana Fifteen. This private luxury villa has everything you need, and more. Fifteen is suitable for large family get-togethers, a couples weekend with friends, or even corporate gatherings. With so many unique living spaces and amenities, Samujana Fifteen is sure to win you over.

Looking out over the bay, the ample outdoor living space on Fifteen’s balcony and terrace are unparalleled. Relax on a soft sun lounger by the infinity pool. Have an alfresco barbeque lunch while gazing upon Thailand’s beautiful landscapes. When the sun sets, head inside for a formal dinner with seating for eight, then a family movie night in the home cinema room, or bury yourself in a good book in the study.

Blurring the line between inside and out and seamlessly merging common spaces are the defining themes of this open concept luxury villa. Modern architecture, simplistic muted tones, and local stone building materials allow the bright beautiful colors of the natural surroundings to capture one’s focus. Floor to ceiling windows help to maintain your connection to nature from the comforts within. Local artwork will make for interesting conversation pieces throughout your stay.

With four nearly identical master bedrooms, it’s easy for everyone to have their own private oasis. Each bedroom features a king sized bed, an ensuite bathroom with a stand-alone shower, a tub and bidet, a lounge area, and access to their own private terrace. The four and a half bathrooms are contemporary in decoration and stocked with top of the line fixtures.

Just minutes from the Ko Samui Rainforest, the spectacular Bohput Hills Golf Club, and a vibrant downtown main street, this villa is located in a truly dynamic area. And with several world class beaches nearby, you’re sure to have all of your Thai vacation dreams come true.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking the inviting deep blue waters of the Andaman Sea, this serene villa is the epitome of peace and tranquility. Here on pristine Natai Beach you can enjoy an unforgettably idyllic Phang Nga vacation. From your deck you can marvel at uninterrupted views of the magnificent ocean. From under the protection of your sheltered pavilion you can dine al fresco as dusk falls and paints the sky crimson and indigo. With exclusive access to the beach, this villa is a rare gem on a sparkling coastline.

Jia at Javana Villas offers unrivalled space and luxury on the very edge of the mighty Indian Ocean. From the moment you arrive and are greeted by the villa’s cascading waterfall you’ll fall under its spell. Your inviting pool is separated from the sea by an uncluttered strip of lush grass and sentinel palm trees. Echoing the gentle sloping bed of the sea, it’s a cool, split-level refuge on sunny summer days. Two adjacent Sala pavilions feature a majestic 12-seater dining table and shaded beachside space for massages and yoga.

This stylish Thai villa occupies three stunning pavilions. At their heart lies ‘The Great Room’ which delivers open plan living on a magnificent scale. Glass doors slide into the walls to reveal comfy chairs and sofas arranged to give you superb sea views or peaceful privacy. An elegant dining table waits to play host to delicious local meals prepared by your Thai chef. Inviting family rooms sit either side of this impressive centerpiece and include an entertainment space boasting a projector screen and snooker table.

The villa’s six sumptuous bedrooms are divided equally between two peaceful pavilions. Fully air-conditioned and dressed in crisp, clean linen they flow with effortless grace. All six open out on to an idyllic garden and terrace teeming with plants. Throw open the doors and you can catch the first rays of morning sun. Two rooms also boast alfresco black granite bathtubs where you can bathe accompanied by the glorious sea breeze and soothing sun.

Set apart from the bustling beaches of Phuket this is a secluded slice of paradise. Here in exclusive Phang Nga you can enjoy the luxury of your own stretch of sandy, untouched beach. Your property covers almost 90 meters of shoreline and often the only footprints on it will be yours. Once you’ve explored your beachside estate you can head for the awesome limestone cliffs and karsts of Phang Nga Bay. Take a boat trip for a close up view of these vertical wonders including the rugged James Bond Island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spectacular is the only way to describe Samujana Thirty. Set at the top of the exclusive Samujana estate, this beautifully designed luxury home has 360-degree views of Koh Samui and the ocean. Book a vacation rental that feels like it’s perched between sea and sky for a unique destination wedding, memorable family reunion or serene wellness retreat.

You’ll be immediately drawn to the villa’s incredible top-floor living area, surrounded by a saltwater infinity pool that looks as though it’s spilling into the turquoise sea. Even the open-air living and dining areas have glass railings for breathtaking effect. On its lower levels, Samujana Thirty has a private gym, home theater and garden. Your holiday at the estate also includes daily breakfast and airport transfers.

Thoughtful architecture and handcrafted details together create a stunning ambience at this vacation rental. In the upper-level great room, clean-lined sofas, a cerused-wood dining table and chairs in sand-toned upholstery add modern silhouettes in beach-inspired shades. Cook in the super-sleek open-sided kitchen (one of two fully equipped kitchens in the villa) or out on the barbecue. A custom spiral staircase leads down past an indoor water feature to other living areas.

The five bedrooms at Samujana Thirty are no less breathtaking, with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and their own terraces overlooking the ocean. Wide sliding glass doors let you open the suites to the breeze, and the understated modern furnishings in neutral tones let the panorama be the star.

Samujana sits on the hillside above hidden gem Plai Laem, putting guests just 5 minutes from the casual stretch of Choeng Mon Beach and the livelier restaurants and bars along Chaweng Beach. The estate staff can help arrange yacht charters to secluded coves for couples on honeymoon, tee times at nearby golf courses and fishing expeditions for active guests, ziplining tours for families, and more.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this property is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project.

Walk up the steps from your own private beachfront to unveil this breezy, modern estate in Ko Pha Ngan, Thailand. Backed by the jungle, and only accessible by boat, this secluded escape is nowhere near the beaten path. Work on your vacation tan while the kids splash around in the pool. When you’re ready to explore, take a sea kayak out on the calm waters below or walk to the nearby waterfall.

Outlined with lush jungle, sandy beach, and ocean views, this pavilion-style estate offers top of the line privacy. A full staff is ready to cater to your every whim while you soak up the sun and the surf of Thailand. Wake up each morning to an ocean vista, no matter which bedroom you choose. Spend the afternoon swimming with tropical fish, through the coral gardens on Secret Beach, or enjoy the seclusion of the infinity pool. Keep up with your fitness routine in the home gym. After a workout, reward yourself with a delicious alfresco dinner prepared by the Thai chef. Then, spend the night sipping tropical cocktails, shooting pool, and catching up with old friends in the moonlit terrace lounge.

Natural wonders await at this secluded jungle estate. Walk to the Phaeng Waterfall, just 1-minute from home. If you’re feeling ambitious, hike the trails through Than Sadet Waterfall National Park or Wangsai Waterfall. If you’d like to check out some of the public beach communities in the area, Secret, Salad, and Bottle beaches are all within 20-km.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set on a lush headland estate with oceanfront views just minutes away from Kamala Beach, One Waterfall Bay offers top tier service and facilities within an expansive tropical retreat. Your family or group is sure to relish the privacy and warm hospitality of the villa, with all the delights of Phuket’s beaches, dining and leisure choices within easy reach. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Take advantage of the views and tropical setting from a spacious swimming pool and terrace that form the heart of the villa. Rooms are spread over four levels, with the main floor home to the living and dining areas, a billiard table, a sparkling professional kitchen and an elaborate cinema room. The pool and hot tub area, with outdoor dining and lounge, are just steps away. A spa with a sauna and whirlpool as well as a rooftop terrace offer more inviting spaces to unwind, while a study allows you to keep on top of things.

The interior design and decor of this private vacation rental is streamlined and contemporary with intriguing touches of Asian flair. Hanging gardens and a brilliant architectural layout offer the feeling of residing and gliding through an installation art piece. High ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows keep the feelings breezy throughout. The professional kitchen is covered in stainless steel and provides a center island with a breakfast bar.

Five bedrooms, including two opulent master suites, are each sumptuously furnished and feature en-suite bathrooms with bathtubs or hot tubs. One of these is twin-bedded, and the others each have king size beds. A sixth, smaller bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom provides extra sleeping space for two. The villa makes a great bet for a groups up to twelve and also serves as a wonderful site for weddings and other special events.

On hand to assist with your stay is a villa manager, a Thai chef and a driver with a nine-passenger vehicle, a rare treat for Phuket. In addition, a guest relations manager will help you explore the island by arranging tours and dining reservations. Though the villa is tucked away on a tranquil headland, it’s easy to reach nearby attractions including Kamala Beach, a stretch of sparkling white sand great for swimming or body boarding, along with excellent restaurants, marinas, golf courses and spas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Lime Samui residences encompass 12.5 acres of hillside splendor, harnessing the topography of the indigenous coconut palm and affording complete privacy. Villa Splash at Lime Samui embraces its natural settings, blending outdoor and indoor living with modern, minimalist aesthetics.The Villa is a fully staffed, luxury villa nestled on the hillside of Koh Samui’s pristine west coast, providing guests with unparalleled views of the Gulf of Thailand and overlooking the unspoiled islands of the Angthong National Marine Park.

Easily accessible to Koh Samui’s many scenic beaches, restaurants and nightlife and within 40 minutes to the Koh Samui airport, Villa Splash at Lime Samui is an ideal destination for couples and families with children seeking the beauty and serenity of Thailand while residing at private oasis that is a home away from home. Upon arrival at Koh Samui airport, you will be greeted with the hospitality for which the Thais are renowned. Your personal driver will whisk you to Villa Splash at Lime Samui in a luxury SUV which may be available also for your use throughout your stay at the prevailing rate.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled amid tropical vegetation, this tranquil villa feels like your very own secret retreat. The entryway leads to an airy, open-living plan where vaulted ceilings (complete with a grand skylight) and soaring windows illuminate the interior in golden rays. Polished hardwood floors flow throughout exuding a beachy vibe. Pick a novel from the book-lined shelf and relax beside the rouge-tiled pool.

The laid-back yet luxurious atmosphere is punctuated by traditional artwork and décor. Fully retractable glass doors open onto the vast, panoramic terrace. Fragrant frangipani trees, lush palms, and ocean views draw you outside to the plump lounge furniture. The chic, white-on-white kitchen features all the essentials—including an in-house chef. Savour the taste of an authentically prepared meal at the alfresco teak table with a breathtaking backdrop of the Five Islands. Softly glowing porch lanterns add to the already dreamy vista; uncork a bottle of wine and bask in the jaw-dropping sunsets. 

Situated within the grounds of a 5-star Intercontinental Hotel, you’ll experience the finest Thai hospitality each minute of your stay. Everything from in-house spa services to boat tours can be conveniently booked. You’ll have access to the resort’s fitness center, kids’ club, 7 swimming pools, and various beach activities. Stroll along the seemingly never-ending stretch of powdery shoreline framed by rippling azure seas or book a snorkeling excursion to explore nearby archipelagos, rich with exotic marine life. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Plan your Phuket holiday in a place where the sea meets the sky at Malaiwana - Villa M. Perched above Nai Thon Beach in the island’s Thalang area, this luxury vacation rental affords panoramic views of the water—and resort-worthy indoor and outdoor spaces from which to enjoy them. Invite up to ten friends for a getaway spent exploring this corner of tropical paradise or extended family for an utterly relaxed vacation.

Your stay at Malaiwana includes the services of a villa manager, cook, housekeeper and guard. Spend lazy days watching fishing boats move across the Andaman Sea from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, and ample spots for lounging, sitting and dining, keep up with your routine in the indoor fitness room or indulge in the spa area. In the evenings, enjoy dinner from the barbecue, then settle into the entertainment and games area or serve refreshments from the bar.

While Villa M draws its architectural inspiration from traditional Thai houses, with its dramatically pitched roof and airy spaces, the furnishings are all contemporary. Tones of sleek black and fiery red-orange create a hip, lounge-like vibe in the open-concept living and dining areas in the great room. If you want to supplement the cook service with a snack, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a lounge area, terrace access and sea views, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Use Villa M as your private retreat on Phuket or as a base for exploring the island. It’s just a short walk from Malaiwana to popular Nai Thon Beach, and a short drive to several other beaches, the Banyan Tree Spa, a choice of shopping areas and two golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
When the surroundings are as gorgeous as they are at Samujana Four, you won’t want to go inside. Luckily, this Koh Samui vacation rental is designed for a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience. Host a memorable family reunion, anniversary celebration or even a tropical wedding with the huge reflecting pool and spectacular sea views as a backdrop.

Samujana Four is perfect for entertaining, with an expansive terrace facing the sea, plenty of loungers and that saltwater infinity pool. Lush gardens create a private ambience, and a rooftop terrace makes it easy to sunbathe or stargaze. In addition to the indoor home theater, this luxury property has its own fitness room and surround-sound system.

All of the villas on the Samujana estate blend seamlessly into the landscape, with open-sided living and dining areas set just off the pool terrace. Clean-lined furnishings in neutral tones keep the focus on the stunning panoramas of sea, sky and hillside that stretch out in front of you. Even the kitchen is open to the warm breezes; you can cook on the gourmet-quality appliances or try out local specialties on the barbecue.

Five suite-style bedrooms make Samujana Four the perfect alternative to a resort for a relaxed, refreshing Thailand holiday. Each bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and its own terrace facing the water. Serene lounge areas in each suite are a reminder to pause for a moment and enjoy the views.

A stay at Samujana includes airport transfers and daily breakfast. The estate staff can also help arrange activities like honeymoon-worthy yacht charters to secluded coves, rounds of golf on challenging nearby courses or thrilling zipline rides over the jungle. But the villa’s location near Plai Laem makes it easy to explore on your own, too. It’s only 5 minutes to family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach or the lively oceanfront restaurants, bars and shops along Chaweng Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hidden away on the tranquil hillside of “Millionaire’s Mile,” this paradise retreat is situated in the exclusive Laemson Estate. Around the corner you’ll find peaceful, quiet Kamala Bay. In classic Thai style, the villa features four standalone pavilions. Walk less than a kilometer to your own private, golden-sanded beach where you can snorkel alongside marine life or try your hand at fishing. 

Traditional thai décor accents the open-concept living space, alongside polished hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, and pitched roofs. Each bedroom reveals glittering views of the Andaman Sea from sliding doors that bring the outside in. An added bonus? Complimentary housekeeping, 24-hour security and your own private chef ready to give you an exquisite taste of Thailand. Walk across the wide timber terrace and slip into the refreshing turquoise infinity pool. The wraparound store terrace features a comfortable teak daybed where you can catch a glimpse of the vivid sunsets. Inside, plush royal blue couches reflect the tropical setting while towering ceilings showcase natural wood paneling. 

The landscaped yard is detailed with manicured lawns, lotus ponds and whistling casuarina trees. Surrounded by forest and turquoise waters, this villa is a great spot for a family getaway or vacation with friends. A plethora of restaurants, bars, and clubs in Patong Beach will suit all of your nightlife needs, as well as nearby Kamala village that features an assortment of local street bazaars.

listing.listing_description:
With a beachfront location and all the amenities and staff of a boutique luxury resort, villa Upni Duniya offers its eighteen guests the chance to experience what life is like at their private beach resort. Upni Duniya’s unique layout makes it easy for your large group to gather as one, as well as maintain a certain level of personal privacy. This vacation villa is perfect for a large family getaway, destination wedding, or high-level business retreat.

Upni Duniya is designed to embrace nature at every opportunity. Decorated with tropical flowers, palm trees, stone features, and ponds, this villa is a bohemian oasis. Inside, you’ll find state of the art appliances and electronics. There’s a fully equipped gym, two kitchens, several lounge areas, and a formal dining area within Upni Duniya’s air-conditioned shared spaces. Outside, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity pool, rejuvenating in the whirlpool spa, and working on your tan for one of many sun loungers and beds. There’s also an alfresco shower, dining area, lounge, and pavilion for you and your guests to enjoy. And, last but certainly not least, you’ll have beachfront access to the incredible Bang Rack Beach, follow the beach path, and you’re there.

The Oceanfront Master Suite is outfitted with an oceanside jetted bathtub, a hot tub/grotto, a cinema, cabana, and private access to the beach and pool. Upni Duniya’s eight other bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and a lengthy list of luxurious amenities. Included with your reservation, you’ll have the help of the villa’s friendly staff, which consists of a manager, housekeepers, security guard, and chef.

The best way to experience Koh Samui’s beautiful environment is to get out and interact with it. If there’s a golfer in the group, Santiburi Country Club and Royal Samui Golf Course are two great places to see the lush tropical flora and dynamic ocean views of Thailand. If you’re feeling adventurous, kite surfing, snorkeling, and scuba diving excursions are easy to find around Big Buddha Pier.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The luxury villa Baan Capo lies on the western end of Bang Rak Beach, along the oceanfront and sands of Koh Samui’s north coast. This vacation rental represents an eclectic mix of styles, from casual beach house to modern chic. Bang Rak itself is a vibrant village, with many choices for dining and cocktails. And the Fisherman’s village and nightlife of Chaweng Beach are just a short drive away.

Sun-seekers will love the deck where the expansive infinity pool takes center stage. You’ll find an alfresco dining table, couches and a canopied ‘cuddle chair.’ The rim-flow pool has a shallow section for children, and stairs lead from the pool deck to the quiet part of Bang Rak Beach. A spacious covered area houses the ten seat, hardwood dining table and outdoor lounge.

Guests enter through an ornate wooden door into the garden courtyard. Sliding glass doors lead to a spacious open plan living room and kitchen. A feature wall of wooden shelving holds an eclectic mix of collectables. You’ll find the large plasma television with DVD, satellite television and JBL surround sound. This space is tastefully furnished with a sea-grass carpet alongside bespoke chairs and sofas. Vaulted teakwood ceilings are fitted with hidden air conditioning and plantation fans. The kitchen features SMEG appliances, with two standard ovens and a wine fridge.

Baan Capo offers comfortable accommodation for eight in its four spacious bedrooms. The two master suites open to the pool deck and covered patio. Master suites feature king size beds and built-in headboards with reading lights. Two triple rooms open to the garden courtyard. Each room is uniquely furnished in its own color scheme.

Since Baan Capo is positioned higher than the beach, guests have spectacular views, yet a passerby can’t look directly in. The staff at Baan Capo have their own entrance as well as a separate service area. The attentive, yet unobtrusive crew are there when you need them, yet out of sight when privacy is required. A continental breakfast is served on the covered terrace. Guests can also enjoy the flexibility of having their own Thai cook on hand to prepare fresh, local produce and favorite Thai as well as international dishes. This villa makes a great bet for a family holiday or a special event such as a wedding.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make your dreams of a tropical destination wedding, family reunion or yoga retreat come true at Samujana Twelve. Designed to host groups of up to fourteen in contemporary style, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental features postcard-worthy ocean views, incredible amenities and gorgeous open-air living spaces.

Set on a double lot, Samujana Twelve is expansive, private and full of ways to play or relax. The outdoor living areas feature two pools, a basketball court, trampoline and even a boxing ring, as well as living and dining areas, a barbecue and a serene rooftop garden. The indoor amenities are equally impressive, from the yoga sala and commercial-grade gym to a home theater that seats twenty and a games room with a wet bar, pool and foosball tables, ping-pong and more.

Walking into the villa feels like stepping into a magazine spread, thanks to the villa’s peaceful water features, textured stone walls, intriguing local artwork and dramatic sightlines to the ocean and hilly coast. Open-sided living areas with sunken, built-in sectionals, long dining tables and fully equipped kitchens tucked behind paneling forge a strong connection to the island landscape; in one of the great rooms, the kitchen is backed by a natural waterfall to stunning effect.

Each of the seven bedrooms is a retreat in its own right, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, sitting area and terrace. Five of the bedrooms, including the master suite, even have their own hot tub for a truly decadent feel.

Your holiday at Samujana includes daily breakfast and airport transfers, and if you’d like, the estate staff can help arrange activities like honeymoon-style yacht charters, scenic games of golf or thrilling zipline rides over the jungle. It’s also easy to explore on your own, since the villa is just above quiet Plai Laem and 5 minutes from both the tranquil stretch of Choeng Mon Beach and the oceanfront restaurants along Chaweng Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Positioned on the corner of the Samujana estate, this four bedroom luxury villa boasts breathtaking views, amazing outdoor living spaces, and outstanding modern contemporary design. With golf, beaches, fine dining, boutique shops, and even a rainforest all within a few minutes, Samujana is a truly dynamic location for your Thai retreat.

With no shortage of dining options, you’ll find ample space for entertaining both inside and out. Formal dining for eight, a breakfast bar, alfresco dining, and a barbeque equipped outdoor living space make it easy to cater to any mood. The multiple levels of this luxury villa display the view of the mountains and ocean from so many amazing perspectives. Indoors you’ll find a study, a lounge, a fully equipped kitchen, and a surround sound system.

Contemporary open concept architecture makes the spaces of Samujana flow beautifully into each other. Integrating indoor and outdoor spaces together, while combining local stone building materials with clean straight sightlines, gives the villa a slightly traditional feel. Muted tones and floor to ceiling windows give Samujana a subtle tranquility, while the local artwork placed throughout provides an interesting splash of color. Wooden accents and designer furniture promote the perfect vibe for relaxing inside the living room.

Each of the four bedrooms at Samujana is identical in their features. King sized beds, ensuite bathrooms with a rain shower and bathtub, bidet, and a lounge area, make it easy for everyone to enjoy their privacy. With private access to the terrace, each bedrooms has its own unique view.

Mere minutes away from the villa, you’ll find access to Choeng Mon & Chaweng beacc and the Ko Samui rainforest. If you feel like an afternoon on the golf course, Bohput Hills Golf Club features some of the best view of the mountains and is the only championship quality course on the island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Watch from the hilltop as sailboats navigate Chaweng Bay at this chic, modern home with panoramic ocean vistas. Sit for dinner at the alfresco table beneath the terrace’s shaded palapa, enjoying the mood set by lush greenery, the pristine swimming pool, and ocean view. If you’d rather dine out, drive 10 minutes to check out the shops and restaurants in nearby Bayview Village. 

Wander the property and find yourself amongst tropical gardens, bamboo plants, coconut trees, and huge boulders. Sip your morning coffee while you stretch out in a sunbed. Then, head back into the air conditioning for breakfast, which is prepared by the included chef service. After a delightful meal, gather the group in the living room’s sunken lounge and discuss plans for the day.

Before dinner, select the perfect pairing from the wine cavern. After, peruse the humidor in the cigar room. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, Vista Azul’s home gym has running and cycling machines, free-weights, and a great sound system. Reward yourself with a long and soothing soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub, right before a glass of wine on the private, ocean-view balcony. 

Pick up something fresh to barbecue from one of the markets in FIsherman’s Village. At night, the village main street becomes a pedestrian zone, and the bars fill with people. You’ll also find traditional Thai cuisine nearby in Chaweng. If you’re feeling adventurous, trek through of Koh Samui Rainforest’s trails or check out the local wildlife at Na Muang Safari Park. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Samsara Estate Viman Villa 2 is a luxurious oceanfront home that will leave you beguiled by its powerful blend of serenity, subtlety and comfort. Built expansively over three levels on a dramatic hillside seafront plot, its indoor living and dining areas open directly onto dramatic wrap-around decks. Outdoor dining and sunning areas encircle a classic infinity-edge swimming pool which dissolves itself into the ocean and its distant sunsets. This six bedroom villa can comfortably accommodate 14 guests and is ideal for larger groups and extended families.

Viman Villa 2 is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any private enclaves in the world match the luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, this ocean-front villa offers spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay Beach and to the south across Patong Bay.This property has indoor and outdoor amenities with the ‘WOW’ factor including a projection television room, three separate outdoor jetted tubs and a state-of-the-art centralized sound system. There’s also Wi-Fi access throughout and a games room to keep children of all ages entertained once the sun has set.

The villa is tastefully decorated with indoor living, dining, and sleeping areas that combine rich Asian furnishings with modern luxuries. Wooden floors and doors work wonderfully well with the tones of white and cream on the walls, giving an overall ambience of luxury and subtle style.

Viman at Samsara has six en-suite bedrooms with air conditioning and majestic views of the ocean that will stay with you always.

The nearest town is only a five minute drive away and there are beaches between a 10-20 minute walk from the front door of the villa. Viman Villa 2 is serviced by a full time, live-in staff consisting of one cook and one housekeeper. Trained to anticipate your needs, they’ll look after you with an infectious blend of Thai graciousness and charm. The estate’s manager and front office team complement the villa’s permanent staff, and are available to provide an unmatched level of truly personal service throughout your stay. Complimentary airport transfers are included in your stay (40 minute drive to Phuket International Airport).

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Entertain or unwind in paradise at Samujana Twenty-One. This six-bedroom Koh Samui vacation rental, part of the exclusive Samujana estate, has outdoor living areas designed for parties and dinners, a large garden and panoramic ocean views. Invite up to twelve guests for a family reunion in the sunshine, a tropical getaway with friends or a special birthday or anniversary celebration.

The heart of this luxury home is a saltwater infinity pool that wraps around an expansive terrace with lounging and dining areas. There’s also a lawn for friendly games, a private gym, a games room with ping-pong and pool tables, and a home theater. Your Samujana holiday includes perks like breakfast and airport transfers as well.

All of the villas at Samujana are designed to take advantage of their incredible location with contemporary style, and Twenty-One is no exception. Covered living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen feel like part of the pool terrace, offering gorgeous views from the tuxedo-style sofas, rustic dining table and generous breakfast bar. A staircase leads down through an atrium to a second great room with living and dining areas and another kitchen.

Each of the six bedrooms has been laid out to open to a terrace with ocean views, and all have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas. Wall-to-wall windows flood each suite with sunshine, and playful, brightly colored artwork lends a touch of whimsy.

If you don’t choose Samujana Twenty-One for its views and style, choose the villa for its location above Plai Laem. It’s only 5 minutes from quiet, family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach, as well as the trendy oceanfront restaurants and bars along Chaweng Beach. If you’re visiting on your honeymoon, ask the estate staff to help arrange a yacht charter to a hidden cove; if you’ve come to play and explore, ask for assistance with tee times at local golf courses, scuba and snorkeling excursions or fishing expeditions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled into the lush tropical hillside of Trisara Resort’s picturesque southern bay, Villa 29 offers an incredibly unique atmosphere for twelve visitors to make the most of their sunny Thai vacation. With six, very private, en-suite bedrooms, and plenty of spacious indoor/outdoor hosting area, Villa 29 is perfect for a family getaway, golf trip, or high-end corporate retreat. With the amenities of the resort, and numerous golf courses, restaurants, and attractions nearby, the island of Phuket is yours to discover.

Villa 29 has three distinctly different vibes throughout its estate. For soothing relaxation, the upper terrace is the place to be. Decorated with traditional Thai architecture, tropical greenery, and an ocean view as far as the eye can see, you’ll surely spend a fair amount of your trip on the terrace. If you move the party inside, you’ll appreciate Villa 29’s bold, yet elegant, color scheme, with regal reds, deep wood tones, and beautiful marble setting a more formal mood in the upper common areas. On the lower level, the Boathouse features gorgeous teak decking, spanning another incredible ocean vista, and perfect for late night cocktails. Each bedroom at Villa 29 comes with a king or queen sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a furnished terrace.

To make your stay even more luxurious, Villa 29 comes with a full-time housekeeper and chef. The villa has both formal and alfresco dining areas, as well as a wet bar and games room, which are perfect settings for after dinner drinks. Tech features include a home theatre, sound system, Smart television, Wi-Fi, and more. On the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity swimming pool while you gaze upon the amazing ocean view.

Within a few short kilometers, you’ll have access to Layan, Dream, Naithon, and Banana Beach, the latter being the closest. If you’re in Thailand to golf, two of the island’s best courses are located within fifteen kilometers, Laguna Phuket and Blue Canyon golf clubs. And, the Boat Avenue Mall is perfect if you’re in the mood to shop.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Climbing the hillside, this multi-level oceanfront home captures panoramic sea views on the quiet side of Phuket. Designed by Gary Fell of GFab, this super-villa is one of Thailand’s most prestigious, and secluded. Throw a pool party on the terrace. Fire up the state of the art barbecue. And bask in the peaceful environment. When you’re ready for some action, drive 10-minutes to downtown Phuket.

Open your eyes each morning to the sun rising above the Andaman Sea. Sip coffee on the terrace beneath the shade of a beach umbrella. If you’re not quite ready for group activity, have that coffee on the master’s private balcony. In the kitchen, you’ll find restaurant caliber appliances that are sure to inspire your inner chef. After breakfast, catch up on some reading by the pool or do a quick work out in the home gym. For dinner, Skyfall’s crisp white walls, mid-century modern furnishings, and spacious open-air interiors set a perfect tone for a party. On quieter nights, curl up with the family for a movie in the living room or a picnic dinner on the lawn.

Hop on a ferry and head out to the neighboring islands to find secluded beaches, natural wonders, and watersport opportunities. Take a sea kayaking tour through the James Bond islands, Monkey Cave, and Karst. For even more excitement, Phuket’s 4-in-1 Tours will have you ziplining through the jungle, white water rafting, exploring ancient temples, and ATVing, all on the same day.

listing.listing_description:
Designed by the multi-award-winning GFAB architects, Villa Blue View is a striking, contemporary villa, perched several yards above sea level in the hills of Koh Samui’s peaceful north coast. Villa Blue View enjoys constant sea breezes and astounding views across the glassy waters of the Thai Gulf to the scenic shores of Phangan island. To the west, you will see the impressive limestone islets of the famous Ang Thong Marine Park.

The generous infinity-edge private pool literally pours into the soothing ocean vistas. Thoughtful inclusions like built-in, cushioned day beds and a state-of-the-art barbeque unit in the poolside sala add to the sense of a sophisticated retreat. The dedicated AV room features a sixty-inch 3D television with Chinese, Korean, Taiwanese, Japanese and English channels. There’s also a state-of-the-art Bose sound system for music and Wi-Fi. With an efficient staff catering to guests’ every need, a private chef available at extra cost who prepares delicious Thai and international cuisine, there are very few reasons to leave the stylish surroundings of Villa Blue View.

Assertively modern architecture and minimalist designs take full advantage of the outstanding location, and guests benefit from an accomplished balance of refined luxury and natural appeal. Beautifully planted garden areas punctuate the living spaces at all levels, surrounding the villa with tropical greenery, while cutting edge technology compliments the natural ambience. With a fully equipped kitchen with luxury appliances and breakfast bar, all your meals will be a made in style. Private comfort, ease and leisure are central to the personalized holiday experience on offer at Villa Blue View.

With a total of five bedrooms, Villa Blue View can accommodate up to twelve guests. Each bedroom includes a king or twin sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and balcony. Step into the master suite and enjoy sweeping ocean views, pristine linens and minimalistic design.

Those guests looking to explore Samui’s attractions are within easy reach of several beautiful remote beaches, as well as a range of shopping and dining options in nearby Bang Por village or Samui’s modest port town, Nathon. With so many options at Villa Blue View, your Thai vacation is sure to be filled with culture and elegant natural beauty. Come enjoy your vacation haven at Villa Blue View!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A veritable Thai hamlet, this stunning ten bedroom beachfront private resort offers a magical Southeast Asian experience. Its location on the serene island of Koh Yao Noi affords otherworldly views of the dramatic limestone karst formations of Phang Nga Bay. The estate’s remarkable design from Naga Concepts was inspired by the temples of Northern Thailand. Get the sublime rest and rejuvenation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Perfect for weddings, private events and corporate retreats, the facilities and amenities include a one hundred foot oceanfront swimming pool, a water slide and children’s pool, a therapist-staffed spa and fitness center, watersports equipment, a yoga pavilion, multiple dining venues and a cooking class facility. In addition to the boutique perks of the estate itself, a wide range of activities embracing the local flair are offered – cave kayaking, mountain biking, rock climbing and cooking classes with your personal chef.

If the word ‘Zen’ could be brought to life it would be in exactly these surroundings. Sacred pergolas, flawless design and mythic rock formations across the sea make Ani Villas Thailand a true embodiment of balance and harmony with one’s natural surroundings. Water features and dramatic columns offer a glimpse of the mastery required in equalizing the forces of yin and yang. And the wet bar will be a delight for the consummate entertainer!

Ten gorgeous bedrooms accommodate up to twenty guests at Ani Villas Thailand. All of the bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms. The bedrooms have been spread over five guests houses, which is great for groups seeking oscillations of social time and privacy. The guest house with four bedrooms offers a private courtyard pool.

Guests of Ani Villas Thailand are transferred to the property from either the Phuket or Krabi international airports by helicopter (10 minutes) or private car or boat (50 minutes). This fully staffed and serviced private estate for families and groups seeking the most exquisite vacations includes daily housekeeping, premier spirits, house wines, soft drinks and juices, all-day snacks and cocktail service, spa services, unlimited movie and music streaming, complimentary international calling and a daily children’s activity program. If you are looking to unwind in style, this is it!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pass the pool and the palm trees, then dig your feet into the sand on the beachfront of this modern villa in Koh Samui. Stretch out in a sun lounger to work on your vacation tan or retreat to the shady palapa to do a little reading. For dinner, dine alfresco as the sun sets, or head into town to find delicious seafood stands and traditional Thai restaurants in Fisherman’s Village.

Bohemian living meets modern luxury at Villa Indu Siam. Indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly, allowing fresh sea breeze and warm sunlight to flow through interior spaces. The fully-equipped kitchen occupies a corner of the open-concept living room, creating a social environment, even when prepping a meal. After you’ve eaten, mix up a tropical cocktail at the wet bar, and challenge a friend to a game of pool. Later on, let the party spill out to the terrace, which will inevitably lead to a pool party. If late-night snacks are in order, fire up the barbecue and grill something fresh from the Fisherman’s Market.

If you’re still in the mood to shop, check out The Wharf Samui and Bophut Plaza, two fantastic street malls that offer everything from local crafts to designer fashions. After a day of shopping, treat yourself to a crazy night in Chaweng, the island’s entertainment capital. In Chaweng, you’ll find buzzing nightclubs, beachfront dance parties, and even more dining options. When you need a break, take an afternoon trip to the Big Buddha Temple.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Glam Habitat is an exquisite complex of luxury residences on the western shore of Phuket in Thailand. Located within walking distance of Kamala Beach, the complex also enjoys close proximity to some of the finest golf courses in Thailand. This four-bedroom, five-bath villa features a private swimming pool along with exquisite alfresco and interior living spaces, making it an ideal vacation rental for families or groups of friends.

The gorgeous pool terrace and expansive roof deck invite you to enchanting days and evenings in the South Pacific light. Lush tropical hedges and trees surround the pool, giving it the feel of a secluded, crystalline lagoon just outside your living room. Sliding glass walls welcome the exquisite coastal air into the home.

The open-concept living area is ideal for elegant evenings together. Sip wine and watch your favorite shows in the sumptuous lounge with flat-screen TV. Prepare meals in the stylish, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, and gather for dinner at the beautiful dining table. High ceilings, ample windows, and exquisite furnishings made of natural materials evoke Phuket's rich natural beauty, while lovely hanging curtains distill the sunlight into an enchanting luminosity. The villa also features a second, spacious lounge with sumptuous sofa facing a TV, as well as a desk for work or study. The outstanding staff includes a villa manager, housekeeping, and 24-hour security guard.

The villa features four bedroom suites: three with king beds and one with a queen bed. The superb king bedrooms all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and tub, and each enjoys a private balcony, lounge area, safe, desk, and television. The master suite additionally includes a walk-in closet, dressing area, and dual vanity.

Glam Habitat enjoys one of the finest locations on Phuket. You're a short walk to Kamala Beach, where you can stroll the white sand at sunset, while Surin Beach is just a few minutes by car. Several other world-class beaches are an easy drive away. Laguna Golf Phuket and Phuket Country Club are both within easy reach, as well. Royal Phuket Marina is less than twenty kilometers away. Just twenty-two kilometers from Phuket International Airport, Glam Habitat is ideal for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located amongst vibrant tropical greenery and mature palms, this spectacular ocean-view four-bedroom villa has the perfect mix of privacy and proximity. Within minutes, you’ll find yourself on the sandy shores of Bophut and Maenam Beaches, shopping in downtown Bophut, or hitting the links at Santiburi Country Club.

Kya’s color scheme and open-air layout are right on point. With soothing cream tones highlighted by light-wood trim, an outstanding number of windows and openings, and hints of ocean-inspired turquoise, Kya sets the mood for an unforgettable getaway. With all of its common spaces and bedrooms facing the ocean view, Kya lets vibrant colors of Koh Samui’s natural surroundings provide the excitement, while fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight create a relaxing ambiance.

Villa Kya’s infinity pool is about as sophisticated as can be. With three-tiers and a swim-up bar, you’ll have plenty of space for swimming, lounging on built-in bar stools, and there’s an easy to monitor, shallow area for the kids. You’ll also have an incredible view of the ocean from each level of the pool. Another great vantage point on the terrace is the Moon Deck, which is located a two-levels above the pool and features a custom designed circular couch. Along the rest of the outdoor space, you’ll find sun loungers, sun beds, alfresco dining, and lush tropical greenery decorating Kya’s relaxing terrace.

No trip to Koh Samui is complete without visiting the Island’s nightlife capital, Chaweng. By day, Chaweng is a vibrant beachfront community, perfect for family fun, water sports, sunbathing, and delicious beachfront cuisine. At night, head to the Green Mango Strip to revel in a wide range of bars, pubs, dance clubs, and other exciting nightlife destinations. On the southern end of Chaweng’s main strip, you’ll find the city’s most popular bar, Tropical Murphy’s Irish Pub, which is especially exciting during football season.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
